mapper.update: UPDATE inventory_details SET frozen_quantity = frozen_quantity + #{frozenIncrement} , available_quantity = available_quantity - #{frozenIncrement}, modify_time=now() WHERE frozen_quantity + #{frozenIncrement} >= 0 and available_quantity - #{frozenIncrement} >= 0 and storage_code = #{inventory.storageCode} and item_batch = #{inventory.itemBatch}
